summaryInsights.title: Membership signal
summaryInsights.detail: Membership growth led by Medicare Advantage (+2.4%); utilization rising with aging cohort.

summaryInsights.title: Medical cost drivers
summaryInsights.detail: Orthopedic joints (DRGs 469/470) and infusion CPT J-codes for oncology/immunology are main cost accelerators.

summaryInsights.title: Provider concentration
summaryInsights.detail: HCA Florida and Baptist clusters showing higher unit costs; ASC migration around Miami driving outpatient spikes.

summaryInsights.title: Policy gap to address
summaryInsights.detail: Tighten cancer drug step therapy and site-of-care; review MA cancer drug exceptions that bypass current edits.
